engine.index.dao.db

Class IndexDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.index.dao.db.IndexDAO

  • public class IndexDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage DB Connection about indexing column name, table name are must write upper case!!
    Author:
    KIMSEONHO

      boolean InsertRegisterMember(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String register)
      insert into REGISTER_MEMBER (URL, ID) values(url, register) url에 대하여 중복검사를 한 후 중복되지 않을 경우 url 최초 등록자로 등록함 contributor는 검색 시스템에 참여하였는가이고 register는 url에 대하여 등록하였는가에 대한 데이터
      boolean isExistContributor(java.lang.String id)
      select ID from CONTRIBUTOR where ID = id(contributor) 검색 시스템에 기여한 적이 있는가에 대한 체크
      boolean isExistRegisterMember(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String register)
      select ID from REGISTER_MEMBER where URL = url AND ID = register 한 id(contributor)에 대한 url 중복등록 체크
      void setAutoCommit(boolean isCommit)
      transaction configure
      boolean updateUploadCount(java.lang.String contributor)
      update CONTRIBUTOR set UPLOAD_COUNT = (UPLOAD_COUNT + 1) where ID = contributor
      int updateURLHit(java.lang.String url)
      update URL_DATA set HIT = (HIT + 1) where URL = ?
      boolean updateURLUploadCount(java.lang.String contributor, int updateURLSize)
      update CONTRIBUTOR set URL_UPLOAD_COUNT = (URL_UPLOAD_COUNT + updateURLSize) where ID = contributor

        Returns:

      • IndexModify

        public boolean IndexModify(IndexDataBean indexDataBean)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        update URL_DATA set HIT = ? where URL = ?
        Parameters:
        indexDataBean - have in update date
        Returns:
        update success or fail
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • InsertContributor

        public boolean InsertContributor(java.lang.String contributor)
        add CONTRIBUTOR and initialize data insert into CONTRIBUTOR(ID, UPLOAD_COUNT, URL_UPLOAD_COUNT) values(?, 1, 1) if contributor was exist, contribute count is add one time
        Parameters:
        contributor - bookmark contributor
        Returns:
        if update is in succeed, return updated url hit times

      • updateUploadCount

        public boolean updateUploadCount(java.lang.String contributor)
        update CONTRIBUTOR set UPLOAD_COUNT = (UPLOAD_COUNT + 1) where ID = contributor
        Parameters:
        contributor -
        Returns:
        if update is in succeed, return updated url hit times

      • getURLUploadCount

        public int getURLUploadCount(java.lang.String contributor)
        select URL_UPLOAD_COUNT from CONTRIBUTOR where ID = contributor
        Parameters:
        contributor -
        Returns:
        0(존재하지 않음), <1(성공), -1(error)

      • updateURLUploadCount

        public boolean updateURLUploadCount(java.lang.String contributor,
                           int updateURLSize)
        update CONTRIBUTOR set URL_UPLOAD_COUNT = (URL_UPLOAD_COUNT + updateURLSize) where ID = contributor
        Parameters:
        contributor -
        updateURLSize -
        Returns:
        if update is in succeed, return updated url hit times

      • InsertRegisterMember

        public boolean InsertRegisterMember(java.lang.String url,
                           java.lang.String register)
        insert into REGISTER_MEMBER (URL, ID) values(url, register) url에 대하여 중복검사를 한 후 중복되지 않을 경우 url 최초 등록자로 등록함 contributor는 검색 시스템에 참여하였는가이고 register는 url에 대하여 등록하였는가에 대한 데이터
        Parameters:
        url -
        register -
        Returns:
        -1 - 실패, 0 - 이미 있음, 1이상(DML을 수행한 수) - 성공

      • isExistRegisterMember

        public boolean isExistRegisterMember(java.lang.String url,
                            java.lang.String register)
        select ID from REGISTER_MEMBER where URL = url AND ID = register 한 id(contributor)에 대한 url 중복등록 체크
        Parameters:
        url -
        register -
        Returns:
        true - already exist, false - not exist in table(REGISTER_MEMBER) data

      • isExistContributor

        public boolean isExistContributor(java.lang.String id)
        select ID from CONTRIBUTOR where ID = id(contributor) 검색 시스템에 기여한 적이 있는가에 대한 체크
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        true - already exist, false - not exist in table(CONTRIBUTOR) data
